name: The Unholy Blessing
description:
By RJ D. and Redacted I.

A small action based game where being blessed a necessity, since you have discovered there is a way to lift your curse as a demon. Become blessed by killing other cursed demons and fight your way to heaven. 

Controls include Z to attack, left and right arrow keys, and space bar to jump. 

CREDITS: 

Artwork: Redacted

Game Mechanics, Sound: RJ
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
